thread.title: Jose Arturo Chapa
thread.title_full: HablaMexico.com reviewed by Jose Arturo Chapa

author: Jose Arturo Chapa
title: Jose Arturo Chapa
text:
While traveling abroad I would have to recharge my cellphone minutes constantly. This presented a problem when I would be in isolated areas or finding a store open at night so as to buy minutes,
Now all I do is access my cell acct and recharge my cell phone and other phones from my laptop, advoiding long lines and carrying cash.
Service you can count on!
JAC
